H0.text: Aung San Suu Kyi is a controversial leader in which country. Thailand

A4.text: Samak Sundaravej, former Prime Minister of Thailand, criticised the amount of support for Aung San Suu Kyi

A5.text: Vietnam, however, did not support calls by other ASEAN member states for Myanmar to free Aung San Suu Kyi, state media reported Friday, 14 August 2009
